resources.string: Times for using the restricted apps
Keep playing%1$dhours or play%2$dhours in total
The password for the two time is inconsistent
The parent control mode has turned on. You can play %1$s in this duration and %2$s in this day.
The parent control mode has turned on. There are %1$s until the next duration you can play and %2$s left in this day.
The parent control mode has turned on. You have no time left in this day and there are %1$s until the next duration you can play.
You have not added or installed games yet
"You havn't play games last seven days"
This game will automatically exit after %1$d minutes. Please exit the game as soon as possible. Moderate games are better for your healthy.
You can still play %1$d minutes in this duration and %2$s in this day. Please exit the game as soon as possible and do some exercise.
You can still play %1$d minutes in this day. Please exit the game as soon as possible and do some exercise.

"Parental control mode is a management software that guides users' healthy life and arranges game time properly. Parents need to set up password and safety issues, and conduct strong supervision and guidance for teenagers."
"After the parent control mode is opened, the following functions will be limited. (1)Modify system time (2)Download or install the game applications. (3)Clean up user data"
Click AGREE, which means you agree to the above terms.
After the password is deleted, the password and security issues are deleted and you need to reset the password after the next use
Do you want to delete the password?
Add a duration for using the restricted apps
If you forget the password, the security question will be used to reset the password lock
A city you once yearned for
"What's the name of your high school teacher"
End time should not be equal to begin time
Your have played game for %1$d hours cumulatively. It is not good for your healthy. You should take a break immediately, do appropriate exercise, and play again the next day.
You have playing game for %1$d hours, suggest you take a rest and do some exercise.
End time should be late than begin time
Playing game properly is help to intellectual development
You are currently in a healthy play time. Please keep it up.
You are already in the tired game time, take a rest before playing.
You have entered the unhealthy game time and suggest you to play tomorrow.
